Articles.Content: Anyone know what's going on with B9? I'm sure this is covered in hundreds of places already, but maybe we could cover it one more time. If it has been orphaned, does anyone have aspirations of making an MM patch for 0.24 cost balancing?
I believe the consensus right now is wait until an update rolls along that breaks B9. Only then will someone adopt it officially.
Or you could do a bit of a search and find that bac9 and Taverius (the authors) are indeed working on an update.
Yeah, he said a week or two for an update.
